xtc.lang.blink
Class CallStack

java.lang.Object

public final class CallStack
extends Object

The Java/C mixed call stack representation.

extractCallStack

public static CallStack extractCallStack(Blink dbg,
                                         SymbolMapper remapper)
                                  throws IOException
Extract a mixed language call stack.

Parameters:
dbg - The Blink debugger.
remapper - The symbol remapper.
Returns:
The call stack.
Throws:
IOException

getCallFrame

public xtc.lang.blink.CallStack.ICallFrame getCallFrame(int id)
Get mixed stack frame by specifying its id.

Parameters:
id - the frame id.

getNativeCallFrame

public xtc.lang.blink.CallStack.NativeCallFrame getNativeCallFrame(int id)
Try to get Java frame at a frame id. If the frame at the id is Java frame, just return this frame. If the frame is a Jeannie macro frame, try obtaining a Java frame within the Jeannie macro frame. Otherwise, just return null.

Parameters:
id - The frame identifier.
Returns:
The Java frame or null.

getJavaCallFrame

public xtc.lang.blink.CallStack.JavaCallFrame getJavaCallFrame(int id)
Try to get Native frame at a frame id. If the frame at the id is native frame, just return this frame. If the frame is a Jeannie macro frame, try obtaining a native frame within the Jeannie macro frame. Otherwise, just return null.

Parameters:
id - The frame identifier.
Returns:
The native frame or null.

size

public int size()
Get the number of the mixed frames.

Returns:
The size of the mixed frame.

toString

public String toString()
Get the readable representation of this mixed frame.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
The string representation.
